BRIEF-HDIL Says Unaware of Any Action Against Co, Promoters on PMC Bank Issue

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Oct 01, 2019 09:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-HDIL Says Unaware of Any Action Against Co, Promoters on PMC Bank Issue Oct 1 (Reuters) - Housing Development and Infrastructure Ltd : * UNAWARE OF ANY ACTION AGAINST HDIL AND ITS PROMOTERS. * HAS AVAILED BANKING FACILITIES FROM VARIOUS BANKS AND INSTITUTIONS INCLUDING PMC BANK * ADEQUATE SECURITY COVER IN FAVOUR OF THE BANKS INCLUDING PMC BANK HAVE BEEN CREATED OVER THE ASSETS OF CO * FACING A TEMPORARY CASH FLOW ISSUES DUE TO THE EXTERNAL ENVIRONMENT IN THE REAL ESTATE SECTOR * HDIL - WITH RESPECT TO PMC BANK, ALREADY ISSUED LETTERS FOR APPOINTMENT WITH THE BANK TO PUT FORTH THE TRUE AND CORRECT PICTURE
